services.title: Civil Matters
services.shortDescription: Expert cost drafting for personal injury claims, contract disputes, commercial litigation, and debt recovery cases.
services.fullDescription: Expert cost drafting for all types of civil litigation including commercial disputes, contract claims, debt recovery, and general civil matters. Our experienced team ensures maximum cost recovery while maintaining compliance with all court rules and procedures.

services.title: Housing Disputes
services.shortDescription: Specialized drafting for landlord/tenant disputes, property litigation, housing benefit cases, and possession proceedings.
services.fullDescription: Specialized drafting for housing law matters including possession proceedings, disrepair claims, and housing benefit cases. Our housing law experts understand the unique challenges and opportunities in this area.

services.title: Interparty Bills
services.shortDescription: Detailed assessment preparation when one party must pay the other side's legal costs. Court-ready submissions.
services.fullDescription: Detailed assessment preparation when one party must pay the other side's legal costs. We prepare comprehensive bills ready for court submission with all necessary supporting documentation.

services.title: Cost Analysis
services.shortDescription: Comprehensive cost analysis and budget preparation for complex litigation matters.
services.fullDescription: Comprehensive cost analysis including budget preparation, cost estimates, and strategic cost planning for complex litigation matters.

services.title: Bill Review
services.shortDescription: Thorough review and audit of legal bills to ensure accuracy and compliance with court rules.
services.fullDescription: Thorough review and audit of legal bills to ensure accuracy, compliance with court rules, and maximum recoverability before submission.

services.title: Consultation
services.shortDescription: Expert consultation on cost rules, procedure, and strategy for optimal cost recovery.
services.fullDescription: Expert consultation services covering costs law, procedure, strategy, and training for legal professionals seeking to improve their cost recovery processes.
